title: dharma shravaNa
sahitya:
dharma shravaNa vidEtigE mUrkhage


anupallavi

  karmAnuSThAnava nesagadiruva durmatiketage brAhmaNa janma


caraNam 1    kONake vINAgAna vidEtige mANikkavedage marakatage 
trANavu tolagida heNNi keDage kaTTANi muttina hAravu koralige
    caraNam 2    SaDu rasAnna vidEtige garddabha uDugora sahidele shvAnanige 
kaDu vrddhage mainerada heNNIna oDane bhOgi penem-babhilAsheyege
    caraNam 3    huTTu kuruDage dIpa vidEtige bhraSTaniketage kula dharma 
shrSTiyoLadamage purandara viTTalana mutti bhajipenemba abhitaSeyatake
